URL enc@de non-àscíï chars §

The documentation title has non-ascii characters, which will be slugified for use in an HTML anchor link.

URL enc@de non-àscíï chars §

The documentation title has non-ascii characters, which will be slugified for use in an HTML anchor link.
A duplicate anchor link will get a numeric suffix.
